'''Prevention Measures''' is a [[Random Event]] that can occur while exploring the world.

==Steps==
# Defeat all enemies

==Dialogue==
{{Dialogue start}}
;(When triggering the quest)
:'''Paimon''': What could those hilichurls be digging for?
:'''Paimon''': (Traveler), let's go fend them off!
{{Dialogue end}}
